CustomField.formula: If (Cumulative_AR__c + Cumulative_Cured_AR__c + Cumulative_WIP__c + Cumulative_Cured_WIP__c + Cumulative_Deferred_Income__c < 0,-1 * (Cumulative_AR__c + Cumulative_Cured_AR__c + Cumulative_WIP__c + Cumulative_Cured_WIP__c + Cumulative_Deferred_Income__c) + Cumulative_Subsequent_Accruals__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Cumulative Pending Accruals
